description:
The Pinyari are in the middle of work, using pickaxes to dig in a mine. All of a sudden, there is a cave in! What will be the fate of the three hundred and thirty three pinyari who got trapped underground?; Fumi has to act as a yellowtail vendor in her nursery school play. Boasting that she can`t lose to Angelina Jolie, she starts practicing; The Kamohara TV seems to be broken. When Dad looks at it, the remote control switch was just in the wrong mode. "Leave it to me when something like that happens!" Dad seems to be very happy. One day...; Stepping on the back of a shoe caused Bunji to argue with his best friends, Ma, Chi and Daichi, and made things difficult. Aso, Bunji`s imaginary friend appears and talks to him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pinyari 333 / Yellowtail Vendor / Dad`s Turn / Aso and Me
ぴにゃり333 / ぶり屋さん / とうさんの出番 / アソちゃんとぼく
